item.title: Info Session: Grace Hopper Celebration of Women in Computing Conference
item.description:
Where: TBD

When: April 7, 2015 6pm

Learn more about the Grace Hopper Celebration of Women in Computing Conference. This year it is happening October 14-16 in Houston, TX.

item.title: Informal Chat: Life After Graduate Studies
item.description:
When: March 31, 2015 5:30-7:30 pm

Where: VCC 301

Join us as we discuss career options after gradate school. We will be joined by Professor Fran Berman and Professor Stacy Patterson.
